title: My heart goes out to fiji, I'm sorry we couldn't defend you ):
body: I"M SORRY FIJI IM SORRY I DID MY BEST

replies.body: I don't know how to feel, I tried my best. Rip.
is this the city that unlocked the free champ or skin if it is UR cheap riot and i hope u rot
